content.text:
# Kids' Choice Award for Favorite Male Artist

This is a list of winners and nominees for the '''Kids' Choice Award for Favorite Male Artist''', given at the Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards. It was first awarded in 2000 at the 13th Kids' Choice Awards, and changed from "Favorite Male Singer" to "Favorite Male Artist" in 2018.
The most awarded male artist in this category is Justin Bieber with 5 wins, followed by Shawn Mendes with 4 wins. Mendes has also won the award 4 consecutive years (2017â€“2020). The artist who have received the most nominations, as of the 2025 ceremony is Bruno Mars with 10 nominations, followed by Justin Bieber and Justin Timberlake with nine nominations each.
